means: open multimedia information terminal 开放式多媒体信息终端

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"疏忽，忽略"或"忘记"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: forget, omit, neglect, overlook, disregard, ignore
means: forget ： 普通用词，侧重某事不重要或太复杂而未能记住，也指有意疏忽或忘掉。
omit ： 指有意或无意地忘记做某事，也指删去被视作不重要、不合意的东西。
neglect ： 侧重指有意的忽略或忽视，也可指粗心与疏忽。
overlook ： 指因匆忙而疏忽或视而不见。
disregard ： 多指有意或自觉地不顾某事。
ignore ： 通常指有意不顾，或不理显而易见的事物。

sentence.Network_en: Please don't omit to lock the door when you leave.
I'll not wish to omit this valuable book from my reading.
sentence.Network_cn: 我可不愿在自己的阅读书目中漏掉这本有价值的书.

sentence.Network_en: Don't omit locking [ to lock ] the door.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin omittere, from ob- 'down' + mittere 'let go'

entry.def: If you omit something, you do not include it in an activity or piece of work, deliberately or accidentally.

example.ex: Omit the salt in this recipe...
example.tran: 省略菜谱中放盐这一步。

example.ex: Our apologies to David Pannick for omitting his name from last week's article.
example.tran: 我们在上周的文章里漏掉了戴维·潘尼克的名字，特此向他致歉。

entry.def: If you omit to do something, you do not do it.

example.ex: His new girlfriend had omitted to tell him she was married.
example.tran: 他的新女友未把自己已婚的事实告诉他。

means.word_mean: 1. prevent from being included or considered or accepted;

sentences.sentence: "The bad results were excluded from the report"
"The workers on the conveyor belt miss one out of ten"

stems_affixes.word_buile: intermit[v.中断]+t+ent……的→adj.间歇的,断断续续的
per始终+mit送,放出,派,错过→始终放出→许可

把……交托给,委托,委任;提交;犯[错误],干[坏事]

stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+mit送,放出,派,错过→送出[气味]等
inter在……中间+mit送,放出,派,错过→在中间送东西→打断,间断
sub在下面+mit送,放出,派,错过→放下面→屈服
per始终+mit送,放出,派,错过→始终放出→许可
re再次+mit送,放出,派,错过→再次放出,送[钱]→宽恕,汇款

means.word_mean: 省略, 遗漏; 删掉

sentences.en: In writing this report I have omitted all unnecessary details.
sentences.cn: 在写这份报告时, 我把一切不必要的细节全都删除了。

sentences.en: Please don't omit to lock the door when you leave.
She omitted telling the teacher about it.
sentences.cn: 她忘了把那件事告诉老师。

jushi.english: Not a single one is omitted.
In writing this report I have omitted all unnecessary details.
jushi.chinese: 在写这份报告时,我把一切不必要的细节全都删除了。
